name: posteria
tagline: A web interface for managing PostgreSQL databases
description: Posteria is a self-hosted web interface for managing and visualizing PostgreSQL databases. It provides insights, performance metrics, and SQL tools in a user-friendly UI.

features.title: Database Visualization
features.description: View PostgreSQL database structure with interactive schema diagrams and relationships

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor query performance, connection statistics, and resource usage in real-time

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Execute queries with syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and result formatting

features.title: Connection Management
features.description: Manage multiple PostgreSQL connections with saved credentials and quick switching

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export query results and table data in CSV, JSON, and other formats
